title: Idarinum Lyrics Tharai Thappattai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
vazhinum saavinum,
varum dhinam poi
veelinum,
nin kalal viduvenallaen.

ennullam kovil
angae undu dheivam.
adhai indha geetham
allavaa,
sollavaa,
unnai thodum
unmai allavaa.

nee vandhadhengo
naanum
vandhadhengo,
nammai ingu
onraai serthadhaen.
isaiye,
endhan munbu
unnai vaithadhaen.

pirandhadhu sittrooil
vazhvadhu olai kudilil.
irukkum ivai vandhu
ennai enna seiiyum.

megamattra vaan pola
thelindha thanneerpola
oottredukkum
isai amudham
endhan meedhu odum

nee virumbum neram
unakidhu vendum
un gavanam yaavum
pozhudhu poga theerum.

ennullam kovil
angae undu dheivam
adhai indha geetham
allavaa,
sollavaa,
unnai thodum
unmai allavaa.

oorgal koodum
thirunaalai.
thodangi vaikkum
en koottam.
mudindhaal oororam
odhungi vazha vendum.

isai dheivam
kalaivaani,
enakkarul un podhum.
oor dheivam pesaadhu
saatchi pola paarkkum.

niraindha endhan nenjam
thirandhirukkum vaanam.
kuraigal thannai thalli
unmai kondu vazhum.
enakkendru edhu undu
ingu indha mannil

ennullam kovil
angae undu dheivam.
adhai indha geetham
allavaa,
sollavaa,
unnai thodum
unmai allavaa.
